bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Emergency and Standby Power Systems for Industrial and Commercial Applications
IEEE Recommended Practice for Emergency and Standby Power Systems for Industrial and Commercial Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Recommended engineering principles, practices, and guidelines for the selection and application of emergency and standby power systems are presented. Industrial and commercial users' needs are outlined and discussed, and the material is primarily presented from a user's viewpoint. General requirements, protection, grounding, applications by specific industry, and maintenance guidelines are included.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
